title: Jade Palace Orianna
body:
first things first, I realize the Lunar Revel skins were announced a while back and that Ori just got herself a nice new holiday themed skin so this isn't ever going to happen, I just wanted to share it because I'm pretty proud of the finished result and figured I'd share!

https://36.media.tumblr.com/300288eed6fed726c2d64ec1fad6cd8f/tumblr_niupx5v9bV1qk32lpo1_540.png

I think there would be some cool opportunities using the dragon on the jade orb for her recall! Hope you guys like it! I named it Jade Palace Orianna in keeping with Jade Dragon Wukong and Jade Fang Cassiopeia

{{champion:61}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:61}}

replies.body:
I think there's a lot of room in this for a really cool recall as well as some cool effects (could do something with the dragon on her ball for her ult)



Certainly something to consider for her next skin. Thanks for sharing!

oooh yeah! I'd originally pictured the two segments of her orb rotating like they normally do but the dragon constantly swirling all over it, then detaching and circling around her during her recall, but incorporating it into her abilities would be SO cool, especially her ult! Thanks!

Like when she ults, the dragon quickly leaps off the ball and makes a very fast rotation around the radius of the ult, then jumps back into the ball and drags everyone in. 

And for her Q, the dragon could lead the ball where it is going, making it sort of pull it.

For her shield, the dragon could circle around the shield for as long as it is up.

So many visual possibilities. Could be a very pretty skin.

these are such cool ideas! When I was painting it I was thinking in the lines of a 975 RP skin but pushing it up to legendary would make some amazing opportunities to use the dragon! I'm probably gonna do some concept paintings of particle effects now!
Just with that, I think this would make an awesome legendary skin.

I have 3 Ori skins already (of who I don't play too often) but I LOVE this skin and would definitely buy it lol. 

Maybe next year riot.
Uhuh epic skin and ideas! Please do it!

Maybe a dragon drawing circling around instead of the usual outline. It would look like the link attached (i couldn't find any dragon drawings but i think you'll get how it looks. Thanks Naruto for providing the art ;) )
u are seriouslty trying to contribute to my bankruptcy one day
League is a "free" game.

I meant this: http://www.gutenbergn.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/lol-pennyarcade.jpg
The irony.

And...?

I'm not sure how I was supposed to know what you were referencing. At all. Your original post alludes barely anything to the comic. Plus, I've never even seen that comic until now.
I wasn't even referencing that specific comic, just "League is a free game but we all spend all our moneyz on it anyways" so "free".
When they told me it was "free" then came "skins" that is the story of how my money "died" {{item:3070}}
That is so beautiful!

Thats a really cool skin, but do we need more ori skins? Shes got like 50 already... although this isn't really relevant I think azir and lucian or some newer champs like gnar could use some more skins. You should try making one for them!
Surprisingly, I think a "Jade Palace" Azir could turn out really cool..

This is so gorgeous!! Do you mind me asking what you used to make it?
I love this, I don't even play Orianna but I still want this xD Very well done.
Thanks so much!! I really appreciate it! I painted it in Adobe photoshop CS6 with a Wacom Intuos pen tablet {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}

Ori is my mid main and I would pay even 1820 for this skin. The headpiece, clothes, the hair, the ball.. oh my!!

I would imagine the tail of the dragon ball when you q and a fiery explosion when you ult or press w
I don't even play Orianna and I want that skin if just for the splash art.
Common, concept art always looks way better than ingame every time.
If this doesnt get made into a skin SOON i think i will murder my unborn children
so relatable
Just found your art independently, so bump! I really want this skin!
this would have been so much better then that frozen inspired barbie doll thing they made for her
Oh my god, she's beautiful.
I don't own Orianna... I would buy her just to get this skin.
bear my children
Always next year. :) Damn that looks good. gj
Damn it's so pretty, I'm so glad I follow OP. His art is fantastic.

DO

WANT
Ooo lala!

it's so beautiful. im just picturing all the cool particles that could go with this.

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Holy shit, that is amazing!!! Could you make it into a custom skin on leaguecraft, I would love to use that on Ori.

PS. That is hands down the best skin I have seen.
Would buy
yes this would easy make a 1820rp skin this skin would be amazing

Pleaseee I beg of you Make this a real skin!It's insanely amazing and not just that!You could say that it suits Orianna because of her lore!She was created by a father when he lsot his daughet who loved to dance!Please make this skin into League of Legends!It's totally worth it!Amazing work Hylia!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
This is amazing, oh my gosh
STUNNING!!
Not an Ori player, but this is really well done.  Great job.
An Ori skin that I actually like <3
Hey I have one champion concept in stock can you help me make the visual look
...i am now an orianna main. no questions

I realy realy like it!!!! I would buy it, for sure!!! 
PLS RIOT!!!!!!!!!!! This skin would be realy nice.

We could name this jade palace oriana with a bundle like the jade bundle with characters like jade palace oriana , jade dragon wukong , jade fang casseiopei , and maybe jade claw skin and something other skin that concludes jade but awsome art .
WANT IT
